result.eng: You will be allowed to do the exam again.
result.ga: Beidh cead agat an scrúdú a dhéanamh an athuair
result.orig: Beidh cead agat an scrúdú a dhéanamh an athuair
result.html: Beidh cead agat an scrúdú a dhéanamh an athuairYou will be allowed to do the exam again.
result.ponchtml: Beiḋ cead agat an scrúdú a ḋéanaṁ an aṫuairYou will be allowed to do the exam again.

result.ga: Chuir mé an ríomhaire ag obair athuair
result.orig: Chuir mé an ríomhaire ag obair athuair
result.html: Chuir mé an ríomhaire ag obair athuairI started the computer again.
result.ponchtml: Ċuir mé an ríoṁaire ag obair aṫuairI started the computer again.

result.eng: She flipped the trip switch. The lights came on again.
result.ga: Chas sí an lasc thuisleach Las na soilse an athuair
result.orig: Chas sí an lasc thuisleach Las na soilse an athuair
result.html: Chas sí an lasc thuisleach Las na soilse an athuairShe flipped the trip switch. The lights came on again.
result.ponchtml: Ċas sí an lasc ṫuisleaċ Las na soilse an aṫuairShe flipped the trip switch. The lights came on again.
